title: (x) Microsoft FS Ad - Times New Roman, Else NPL {Mike Y, Mark S}
content:
I have tried a long time to figure out wich font this is: [http://www.aci.com.pl/mwichary/pics/computerhistory/ads/international/microsoft/flightsimulator3-byte8812.big.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127111338/http:/www.aci.com.pl/mwichary/pics/computerhistory/ads/international/microsoft/flightsimulator3-byte8812.big.jpg)   
maybe someone here can help me?
author: arkiku

comments.content: Times New Roman Condensed, I think. Or Times NR squeezed.
